posts.content:
Thanks Buzz for a great time on our first OCD and ordering the good weather for the weekend.

Thanks to everyone who helped push the half mile to the garage, the support and advice, the loan of tools and everyone else for being so patient when we broke down. For anyone reading this who wasn't there, the external oil cooler had split which I managed bypass.

Got home OK. Lack of an external oil cooler didn't seem to cause any overheating problems on the way home.

Just to echo what everyone else has said, fantastic road trip.
Thanks Buzz and Maz for organising everything. Especially the surf lesson.
Just got home before midnight. We had five in the convoy on the way home, it was like an extra day on OCD.
And thanks to the bus for getting us there and back with just a dodgy indicator and sticking front brake.( jobs for tomorrow)
Roll on OCD XIV

As everyone else said - thank you ever so much Buzz and Maz for organising such a great trip!

Thanks to everyone for being patient when Fay was feeding Edith when we were supposed to be leaving!



Sent from my GT-I9300 using Tapatalk 2

Huge thanks to Buzz and Maz and everyone else.

We all enjoyed it immensely again. Great to see everyone.

Pics to follow when I eventually get out of bed after my post OCD lie in....

What a chuffin awesome time we had!
Massive thanks to Buzz and Mazz for organising it all. Campsites were great, cruises were great, surfing was great, everything was great! even the weather!

Thanks to Mike for taking my wheel and getting the tyre valve fixed. I owe you one.

I will try and upload some photos tonight if i dont fall asleep.
Got some video to roughly edit too...
thanks again!
Ben and Sam

Great weekend, great company!

Special thanks to Maz for organising Buzz to organise the weekend!

Paul and Linda

Great OCD - thanks Buzz and Maz

We loved every minute - well almost every minute. Turns out the retired Captain RN was well over 90 and has a DSM for destroying enemy submarines . Clearly lost his navigation skills a long time back and maybe doesn't like German machines Comical bits were "you had better shout - I don't have my hearing aid in" and " What is this? The Peasants Revolt?"

Great drives, great weather, great sites, great company !

Brian and Caroline

PS - HAPPY BIRTHDAY TODAY ALAN!! THAT'S TODAYMATE

Can someone in N Devon remind him..............................???

PPS - the bus made it back OK, unlike Caroline's Octavia (left at the first site) that destroyed its DMF 10 miles along the link road and had to be recovered back home
thanks Buzz & Mazz for a fantastic OCD and also to the guys from notts & doncaster for the road trip back home Bob n Julie

Thanks for a great time Buzz and maz looking forward to our European adventure.
Faye&Dave
Top! weekend cruising and chillin in Devon Buzz and Maz

Thanks to Buzz & Mazz

all the other vw peps that a amesome weekend

Gaz

Massive thanks to Buzz and Maz for another fantastic cruise, had a great time and good to see everyone again and meet some new faces.
Roll on next year ! Counting down till next year ! No OCD baby thankfully !
Cheers everyone

Superb as usual. The kids especially enjoyed in. Viola (2 years old) on the way back today asks: "Where are the other buses Dad?". That's my girl

Great effort from Bob (holding up traffic in Braunton irrespective of the traffic lights), JK for saving 30 spaces at Saunton Sands (irrespective of irate punters) and everyone's team spirit in dealing with the breakdown on the A361 (irrespective of everyone else)! And Buzz, of course! I'm looking forward to next year already.
Cool pics Sean & a lovely quote from your daughter !

Wow that looks like a cracking weekend!!!
Bet yous were popular with other road users tho!!
